label: Bioactivity Prediction
description: Predict compound bioactivity (pEC50 / pIC50) across multiple biological targets using ML-based models.

defaultInputs.name: Compound List
defaultInputs.description: List of compounds to be evaluated for bioactivity

defaultInputs.name: Target List
defaultInputs.description: List of biological targets and assay types (EC50 / IC50)

defaultOutputs.name: Bioactivity Prediction Results
defaultOutputs.description: Predicted bioactivity values (pEC50 / pIC50) per compound per target
